Articles.Content: I'm about 50% through this book. The gist is in the near future say 20 years or so NASA sends astronauts to Mars. Things go bad, one gets left behind. Kindle store has it for about $9.99. Good humor and a good story so far.

SPOILER ALERT

That bit at the end where the dragon swoops down and picks up Mark Watney was totally unexpected.

I'm about 50% through this book. The gist is in the near future say 20 years or so NASA sends astronauts to Mars. Things go bad, one gets left behind. Kindle store has it for about $9.99. Good humor and a good story so far.

May have to get this as a REAL book from the library, which, believe it or not, is a place where they have these things with ink on paper.
